title: Probabilistic Machine Learning: An Introduction
description: Modern textbook covering probabilistic approaches to machine learning, including Bayesian methods and uncertainty quantification.

title: TheBatch: Andrew Ng's Deep Learning Newsletter
description: Weekly newsletter providing updates on the latest research, trends, and applications in deep learning.

title: Open-Source Library for LLM Fine-Tuning
description: A user-friendly library for fine-tuning large language models with support for various architectures and datasets.

title: Simple Framework for Contrastive Learning of Visual Representations
description: Incredibly well-written paper about a simple and high-performing framework for contrastive learning of visual representations.

title: Call for Bayesian Deep Learning in Age of Large Scale AI
description: A compelling argument for integrating Bayesian methods into large-scale AI systems to enhance uncertainty estimation and robustness.

title: Open-Source Bayesian Deep Learning Library
description: A library providing tools for implementing Bayesian deep learning techniques in modern neural networks.

title: LLM Engineer's Handbook
description: Comprehensive guide for engineers working with large language models, covering best practices and implementation strategies.

title: Interactive Transformer Visualization
description: An interactive tool to visualize and understand the inner workings of transformer models.

title: Bayesian Optimization in Action
description: Easy to follow and practical introduction to Bayesian optimization techniques.

title: Learning LangChain
description: A practical guide to understanding and using LangChain for building applications with large language models.

title: Opinionated Arch Linux Setup
description: Arch Linux distribution built for devs, without the headache of setting up Arch yourself. A curated Arch Linux setup with a focus on simplicity and developer productivity.

title: Learn Docker in a Month of Lunches
description: A great hands-on guide to learning Docker through practical examples.

title: Lightweight Self-Hosted Server Monitoring Tool
description: A simple and user-friendly tool for monitoring server health and usage metrics.

title: Self-Hosted Budgeting and Financial Management Tool
description: A personal finance manager that you can host yourself, offering budgeting and expense tracking features.
